item.description:
What: Golf Lessons - 4 Tuesdays

When: Tuesday, May 25, 2010 @ 6:30 PM (instruction will begin @ 6:30)

Cost: $100 per person - $25 per lesson - great price

Where:

Rockland Golf Course
276 Plain Street
Rockland, MA 02370
781-878-5836

Who: No Guests for this meet-up as demand is high and space is limited


Hello Everyone -

I'm excited to announce our 2010 Golf Lessons beginning soon. Last year we had a great turnout, learned a lot and had great fun - let's do it again!! If you're new to the lessons this year - great! If you're joining us again - even better! Everyone is Welcome!!!

To all that joined us last year, unfortunately, the Braintree Course is not offering group lessons this year. However, it should prove to be a great program at the Rockland Course. I've met with the Golf Pro (Nikkie) and discussed our game plan based upon feedback from last year.

This year the lessons will include:

- lessons for Beginner/Intermediate Golfers
- two dedicated Golf Pro instructors
- one hour lessons (may go longer)
- group will be split in 1/2 each week & learn 20 minutes of instruction
from each pro = 40 minutes
- group will then convene and put the 40 minute instruction into live play
on the course
- Golf clubs and balls will be supplied to any member if needed at no charge
- discount round of golf offered to group that I will plan once clinic is complete

Tentative Lesson Plan:
• Lesson #1 – Putting and Chipping
• Lesson #2 – Pitching, working on short game
• Lesson #3 – Working with Irons
• Lesson #4 – Woods, driving, T off

PAYMENT:

Upon your "Yes" RSVP, I will email you details and my address to mail your $100 check

NOTE:

If you RSVP to the clinic you are committing to the entire 4 weeks of classes or $100’s

If you know before the clinic begins of a week you need to miss - let me know and you won't be charged for that week

If you have an absence during the clinic that wasn't determined before hand, unfortunately, I cannot refund for the week missed

Plan to arrive a few minutes early to get organized and into our groups as the lesson will begin promptly at 6:30 pm

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.


Organizers: Susan (AO)

The Final Deadline is Noon, Tuesday, May 18th. Please be mindful if you change your RSVP to NO at the last minute as you may be taking a spot away from someone else that is serious about participating.

Weather Alternative:

None. This event will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. We will do our best to cancel that afternoon or the night before. So check your email if the weather seems questionable. However, we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not assume a cancellation unless you recieve an email saying so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: GOLF CLINIC - 4 Wk Golf Lessons
